title: Hello
content_html:
I’m not really sure what sort of articles will be here. Serious. Total nonsense. What sort of topics will I feel inclined to write about tomorrow? Next week? Next year?

Next decade?

Not sure at all, but I’ll tell you what I’m in the mood for today: things that sound kind of like Ars Technica:

  • Arse Technica
  • Farce Technica
  • Mars Technica
  • Parse Technica
  • Arts, Technica
  • Del Arte, Technica
  • Cars Technica
  • Ars Technicast

(I have never heard of many of these things before today)
